description: Floor framing detail sheet with 12 numbered details covering joist-to-beam connections, shearwall sill plate connections, ECCO column cap details, strong wall connections, guardrail specs, and floor sheathing details. Details reference shearwall schedule and SDS fastener specifications throughout.
key_content: Sill plate connection at shearwall: min 2x w/ SDS 1/4" x 4" @ 16"
Detail 8: 1/2" plywood over 1-3/4" x 14" LVL stringer @ 12" O.C.
Detail 11: ECCO column cap welded to column with 1/2" bent plate, w=0.75" M.B.
Detail 10: Strong wall connection — L7x4 at 16" O.C. staggered each face, PL 3/4" x 4" with 4-7 dia. 4.5" lag screws, Hilti into conc. 4" embed (ICC-ES/AC 517)
Detail 9: Typical metal guardrail — HSS 1.5" x 1.5" x 2" top/bottom rails and vert. posts, 1/2" sq. intermediate bars, 4" sphere rule
Detail 3: Steel beam to ECCO post cap, column connection per detail 1/S3.4
2x continuous blocking w/ shear clip per shearwall schedule
U hangers at joist-to-beam connections throughout
2x blocks at 16" at joist bearing locations
3x top nailer per detail 11/S3.3 at steel beam connections
Existing framing shown shaded in Details 5 and 12
NOT SHOWN: joist sizes (referenced as 'per plan')
NOT SHOWN: beam sizes (referenced as 'per plan')

drawing_zones.content: Wood beam to joist connection with shearwall sill plate
Steel beam to ECCO post cap connection
Sill plate connection at shearwall with SDS spec
Floor sheathing with LVL stringer at 12" O.C.
Shearwall to joist with continuous blocking
Shearwall at top plate with guardrail
Sill plate connection at existing framing
ECCO column cap welded connection detail
Holdown and beam/strong wall connection with lag screws
Typical metal guardrail with HSS members and 4" sphere rule
